channel.title: Need Help
channel.description: Does anyone know how to make an accumulator actually accumulate some of your arrows?

item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

Adam
Senior Member

Rep: 200
[Rep++]
Online Online

View Profile WWW Personal Message (Online)

Re: Accumulator
« Reply #1 on: Today at 06:58:05 pm »
Reply with quoteQuote
Ok, so I say this every post I make; but, I haven’t worked with private servers in a while…

There should be a variable/method that controls the rate at which arrows drop. All you should have to do is edit the method that controls the rate, so when the player is wearing the accumulator, the rate changes.

Psuedo:
Code:

void method() {
if (p.equipment == ####) {
// Change rate
} else {
// Normal rate
}
}

Sorry I cannot provide any code for you. I am not familiar with the methods of RSPS anymore

Read full topic
